short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect YouTube Shorts to normal video format with a toggle switch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of watching YouTube Shorts in the limited vertical format? With "YouTube Shorts to Normal Video," you can automatically redirect Shorts links to the standard YouTube video player for a better viewing experience.

Key Features:

Toggle Switch: Easily enable or disable redirection as per your preference.
Seamless Experience: Automatically redirects Shorts to regular videos without interruptions.
User-Friendly Design: Intuitive interface with a lightweight and fast setup.
How It Works:

When enabled, any YouTube Shorts link you open will automatically redirect to the normal video format.
Toggle the feature on or off from the popup menu, and see real-time updates.
Simplify your YouTube viewing experience today!
